title: unban me riot
body:
so i got banned today for 14 days reread the report its not evan that bad i spend alot of money on this game so please unblock me befor you lose another player. its almost the same be a the donkey bann 
you guys judge by the in game text but not the actions of players if youve seen the game youd understand it better 
so please unblock me so that i may play my favorite video game 
thank you 
sincerely Epiczace,

replies.body:
1: Chat logs :3 
2: Riot won't unban you
3: Chat logs ;3

> [{quoted}](name=epiczace,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mnKFVgbw,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-06T22:03:06.989+0000)
>
> so i got banned today for 14 days reread the report its not evan that bad i spend alot of money on this game so please unblock me befor you lose another player. its almost the same be a the donkey bann 

no idea who donkey is, and i dont care you spend alot of money...if you want to talk about your ban should you give us the info needed to do so. 

> you guys judge by the in game text but not the actions of players if youve seen the game youd understand it better 
 
again no info, and even if we had that is it still your actions that are judge because its your case...
> so please unblock me so that i may play my favorite video game 

no and cool.

> thank you 

you are very welcome.

> sincerely Epiczace,

regards higura
You are not special. You're not a beautiful and unique snowflake. You're the same decaying organic matter as everything else.

This was almost unreadable. Cannot tell if troll or..

Typically if riot bans someone, it is because their loss would be a benefit to the game. Maybe learn from it and improve your behavior.
